componentDescription: An unstyled option group to be used within a Select.

disabled.description: If true all the options in the group will be disabled.

label.description: The human-readable description of the group.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside the Input.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside the OptionGroup. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.label: The component that renders the label.
slotDescriptions.list: The component that renders the list.
